'''Cubic Tricks''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Pate de Fruit]] with [[Lyney]]. The [[recipe]] for Pate de Fruit is obtainable from [[Louis]] for 5,000 Mora.

Cubic Tricks increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''20'''% and CRIT DMG by '''20'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
